title: Wtf do i have to do to finally get banned?
body:
So I decided to get myself a permaban so i can finally leave this cesspool of garbage.
This game just isnt for me bc i have literally 0 selfcontrol.
The last game 10 games i tried to be as toxic as possible, i literally had to think hard how i could  even more flame. I came up with thing i actually felt bad for after. I tried to use as many buzzwords as possible. And what happend? Nothing. Not even chat restrict. Gg rito, i guess now i start just running down mid from beginning while insulting people, if that doesnt work i get a scrip program -.-

I looked at your last 5 or so games and didn't see anything beyond being a good teammate.

You were lightly punished with a chat restriction before that for having 2 bad games that are out of character with your normal good sportsmanship.
